thread.title: The Future of News is Not an Article
thread.title_full: The Future of News is Not an Article

title: The Future of News is Not an Article
text: Print Page by: Alexis Lloyd | NYT Labs In May of this year, Facebook announced Facebook Instant Articles, its foray into innovating the Facebook user experience around news reading. A month later, Apple introduced their own take with their Apple News app, which allows “stories to be specially formatted to look and feel like articles taken from publishers’ websites while still living inside Apple’s app”.
